title: Weird Green flashing cursor in top left of firefox screen
content:
I get a weird green mark on the top left, which looks like some type of greenscreen cursor input thing. I have seen it on Gmail. Not sure where else. Last time was a while ago.

This is on Windows 11. Just worried if this is some type of backdoor thing.
creator: duncan27

title: Firefox update broke Hulu
content: After Firefox update on August 6, 2024, I cannot use Hulu video streaming. There is a black screen. Rolling back to 128.0.3 solves the problem. Will there be a fix so that I can update Firefox to the latest version?
creator: erica.j.kilian
